QuestData.Title: Mushroom Mixer
QuestData.Description: Now what we need is something to spike the mojo with. Something that'll make it so that when the prophet drinks it, he'll become less powerful.$B$BDrak'Agal lies to the east. There's a mushroom there that the natives call muddlecap fungus. I think it's exactly what we need.$B$BBring back lots of them. When we mix them into the mojo, the mind of anyone who drinks it will become muddled.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect 10 Muddlecap Fungus and deliver them to Hexxer Ubungo at The Argent Stand.
QuestData.CompletionText: Do you have all of the fungus?$B$BOh, and watch out for the basilisks lurking over there.
QuestData.RewardText: <The hexxer nods his approval.>$B$BHand that fungus over and I'll mix it up with the mojo and elemental lord fluids.
